name: Loren Wang
highlights: Over 6+ years of intensive full stack software development and cloud development experience
Strong academic background with BSc. in computer science and MSc. ongoing
Programming Languages: Java, Python, JavaScript, Go, HTML, CSS, PHP, C/C++
Frameworks: Spring, Spring Boot, React, Node.js, Express.js
Database & Tools: MySQL, Postgres SQL, DynamoDB, MongoDB, Git, AWS, CI/CD, Jenkins, Docker, K8S, Jira, Travis
Knowledge: RESTful APIs, Data Structure, Algorithm, Agile, Test-Driven Dev, Linux/Unix

responsibilities: Developed and optimized RESTful APIs for Amazon Fulfillment Technologies' order processing and inventory management systems, enhancing performance and reliability of critical backend services.

Contributed to the design and implementation of a microservices architecture, using technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes, improving system scalability and maintainability within the fulfillment domain.

Worked on data processing pipelines and distributed systems using Apache Kafka and AWS Lambda, ensuring efficient handling of large-scale data in real-time for analytics and reporting in the warehouse management system.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and address performance bottlenecks in database operations and API calls, utilizing tools such as profiling, tracing, and monitoring with Amazon CloudWatch and AWS X-Ray.
Adapted to a fast-paced work environment and high expectations, building resilience and improving time management and prioritization skills.

Developed APIs with AWS API Gateway, Step Function, Lambda Function, and Python, to query and clear terminated nodes among 5000+ VM instances, from Centrify portal and major cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and GCP.
Implemented and refactored unit tests for 20+ lambada functions using Pytest, Coverage, with over 80% coverage.
Integrated static code quality investigation and test coverage visualization using Sonarqube into Jenkins pipeline.
Implemented automations with Terraform to provision and manage Cloud services like EC2, S3, and DynamoDB.
Worked on both web development and operation projects for 1000+ healthcare industry clients.
Designed and implemented an internal web tool to streamline the extraction of server logs from 2000+ remote nodes, which reduced the operation timeline from 3 days to 1 hour.
Developed front-end features and back-end services using React, Node.js, Java Spring Boot, Shell script, Jenkins.
Investigated app operation bottlenecks regarding Cloud Server (Azure) and Database (SQL Server).
